title: I'm facing issues with pixel visual core service It started after december security patch update.
content:
I'm facing issues with pixel visual core service It started after december security patch update. Pixel visual core service has stopped working for apps like snapchat & instagram like it's meant to. image processing software works fine only when charging 
When my device is charging i have to force stop apps like snapchat & instagram & then click pictures. Then only the pixel visual core service is working. It happened only after december security patch and 
I'm sharing two images one while charging the device and one without.
